mapper.insert: insert into druglist(entp_name, item_name, item_seq, efcy_qesitm, use_method_qesitm, atpn_qesitm, intrc_qesitm, se_qesitm, deposit_method_qesitm, open_de, update_de, item_image, atpn_warn_qesitm) values(#{entp_name}, #{item_name}, #{item_seq}, #{efcy_qesitm}, #{use_method_qesitm}, #{atpn_qesitm}, #{intrc_qesitm}, #{se_qesitm}, #{deposit_method_qesitm}, #{open_de}, #{update_de}, #{item_image}, #{atpn_warn_qesitm})
